summary: The Unearth Innovation Act (S. 598) establishes a mineral and mining innovation program within the Department of Energy to advance domestic mineral resources. It focuses on research, development, and deployment of new technologies for responsible mining, extraction, and processing of critical minerals. The act aims to promote economic growth, national security, and environmental sustainability. It mandates coordination between the Secretary of Energy and the Secretary of the Interior, along with collaboration with various stakeholders, including Indian Tribes, academia, and industry.  It authorizes $100 million annually for fiscal years 2026-2035.
